website_summaries.verdict: A small, and lightweight, portable design makes this model fantastic for keeping your devices charged up on the go.
pros: This Ultra-Compact travel charger provides dual USB ports with 2.4 amps in each
PowerIQ and VoltageBoost, combined with a foldable plug, allow for the quickest charge in a sleek design
cons: This charger does not support Qualcomm Quick charge for Android users
The LED light will also stay a constant color, regardless of whether the device is fully charged

customer_reviews.title: Smaller footprint but lacks charging feedback light
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased many Anker products, and have always found them to be some of the best solutions available. This unit is disappointing as one of the most critical things to know from your charger is whether it is charging (other models change color) or when charging is complete. This unit doesn’t change color-stays blue while plugged in. UPDATE: Anker customer service contacted me immediately and shipped a revised version of this charger which does have an active charging feedback light feature. Most impressed with their commitment to customer service and satisfaction!
customer_reviews.author: R. See

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service and intentionally difficult warranty policy
customer_reviews.text: Anker products were at one time a great option on Amazon for quality products. However their customer service is TERRIBLE and they intentionally make is very difficult to get an exchange— They keep NO records of sales to customers and want you to take pictures of the items... provide pictures of the serial numbers on the items, confirm if you have completed troubleshooting, try different devices to confirm there is a defect, they then conduct an investigation, you then have to return the item via a shipping label.... all this for an $8 cable. Terrible policies and intentionally difficult processes. Look for the amazon brand to get better customer support in the future, or better amazon partners.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Pioneer

customer_reviews.title: Compact form factor with lots of power
customer_reviews.text: I own Anker powerport elites and I love them for their charging capabilities with my iPhone and iPad. This power port 2 is an upgraded version in a reduced form factor, and I absolutely love it as it fits much more easily in my iPad travel case! I get about the same output as Apple's $21 iPad charger, but this gives me two USB ports in a smaller form factor. Definitely worth a look!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Sinatra

customer_reviews.title: Works for Galaxy and iPad. Light weight.
customer_reviews.text: worked fine on Android Galaxy S5 (micro usb) and iPad also. Light weight 2.8 oz. I wanted one that was lighter than the two I carry now and would only tie up one 120V outlet and had no cords to plug into the wall. I tested on Galaxy and Apple iPad and charged at good rate. Got a little warmer than expected charging two devices, but not unreasonable.
customer_reviews.author: denpick

customer_reviews.title: Falls out of the wall
customer_reviews.text: Edit 5-9 Anker responded very quickly. They replaced the original white one I ordered with a black one that is a smidge larger. This one has only fallen out of the horizontal power strip once in the past week . Way better than the first one I had. I changed my review from 2 stars to 4, and would recommend it now. Original review:While this charger charges very well. It falls out of the wall easily. Even if I use a horizontal power strip, it constantly falls out. It falls out if you just think about a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: dart

customer_reviews.title: ANKER IS  ALWAYS THE BEST CHOICE
customer_reviews.text: Anker product is always the best choice. Quick intelegent charge earns only two stars due to the fact that the bright blue light doesn't turn green and reduce to trickle charge like the other Anker charger does is my reason to rate only two stars. Customer service has sent a replacement out with out any hassel. I am amazed at Anker's commitment to satisfied customers. The new charger does Exactly as I expected the first one to do. Still my issues is the original advertising said newer model available. I took that as one click and I automatically would have the newer model. That's my fault I flubbed that one. Thank you Anker for making this rite.
customer_reviews.author: HA Shevak

customer_reviews.title: Nice blue light comes on when plugged into the outlet
customer_reviews.text: The power port works as advertised. I have used it once so far and it charged my iPad with no issues. Nice blue light comes on when plugged into the outlet. The prongs fold down when not in use, and it is nice to be able to charge 2 devices at the same time. The Anker nylon braided USB lightening cord I also bought is well made and long enough (6 foot) for my purposes. Good combination of products. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice charger, Smaller then the original powerport 2. Still feels like a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Working well so far
customer_reviews.text: Only have been using it a few weeks, but so far it's been reliable. I use it to power my old iPhone which I use as a night stand clock, and my iPad when I go to sleep each night. The LED light on the front is dull enough that it doesn't light up the room like an old Belkin charger I had. I did have the previous Anker dual charger which had a horizontal LED light instead of this circular LED light. That older version unfortunately barely lasted a year before it kept sparking and popping. I stopped using it because I was afraid of a fire. Hoping they fixed the bugs and this one is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Mckeon

customer_reviews.title: Great until it stopped charging my devices
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in early June. Stopped charging 5 months later. Slow death over a one week period. Started having to plug and unplug devices In order to engage the charge until finally nothing but the blue light indicating my unit needs to be charged. Checked all cords and even swapped them. Tried different outlets without luck.
customer_reviews.author: CD Philly

customer_reviews.title: Works, but loose fit in plug
customer_reviews.text: Works well for charging my iPad and Android phone simultaneously. The blue power indicator is a nice touch, as are the fold-in prongs. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because--as others have mentioned--the prongs of this device are really a loose fit in standard US plugs. It could easily slip out if mounted in any orientation but straight down. I sort of fixed this by spreading a just bit of solder on the outside of each of the prongs. Had to then sand it down to get it just right. This shouldn't be necessary. The prongs should be just a bit thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK until you need support then you’re just Out of luck.  Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy Anker products. They’ll work, they’ll fail, Then you’re out of luck when you try and get warranty. They’ll tell you the current model you bought has a very limited warranty but if you buy the new model it has a lifetime warranty. Pure scam tactics in my book. These things aren’t cheap and then when you have a problem you’re just out.
customer_reviews.author: CasualBuyer

customer_reviews.title: High quality customer service!! They stand by their products.
customer_reviews.text: I received on 9/27, quit working 11/04. Just 11 days past guarantee. So I’m not happy at all. I tried every outlet, nothing! However I also contacted Anker directly and I have never received such wonderful customer service. I have a new dual charger sent at no charge and it’s working perfectly. I will not hesitate to buy products from Anker again. I would like to commend Anita for her impeccable customer service. Polite, responsive, eager to help and eager also to keep Anker known for its high quality customer service and product performance. Thank you Anker and especially Anita.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Bright Light; Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Update: After my initial reviews about the charger having a bright light, I was contacted by Anker. They were very helpful and resolved the issue above and beyond my expectations. I would highly suggest buying Anker products...they truly stand by there products!!! The blue light on this stays on even when not charging...it’s really bright and makes it hard to sleep for those like myself that like it dark.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy C. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Fast Charging, Convenient Carrying
customer_reviews.text: I love this little charger. I already own 2 and have just ordered a 3rd. This will charge my Anker PowerCore II 20000 in under 5 hours from dead, my Samsung Galaxy S8+ in 45 minutes from dead and my Samsung Galaxy tablet in 1 1/2 hours from dead. It is compact and small, easy to travel with, I am a consultant and constantly on the road so am always concerned about weight and space, this fits the bill. I love the folding plug prongs, helps to not get tangled with everything in my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: No Intelligent Lights
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this charger. Other Anker products emit a green light while charging and a blue light once the device is charged. This charger lacks this great feature. Skip on this one and look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect size for my work backpack
customer_reviews.text: Another phenomenal anker product. I purchased this charger for work travel. It's the perfect size for my work backpack. Convenient size so it doesn't take up a lot of space. Small enough for quick deployment between flights on layovers without hogging up valuable outlet space for others. Great way to make temporary airport friends when they ask if they can plug in with you. Anker has definitely made themselves a product name I know I can trust and it always comes with some of the best customer service/support anytime I've had a problem or just a question.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed with this charger & I bought 2 of these. It charges so slow. It takes 2 hours & 30 mins just to give me a full charge. And with the other 2 charger's that I purchased from Anker all I have to wait is 30 to 45 mins max. I purchased these because I already have 2 (4 port & the older 2 port one) and thinking these are going to be the same I stupidly threw the boxes right after opening and now I'm stuck with 2 slow chargers and going to have to purchase another 2 that are actually fast charging.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Mora

customer_reviews.title: And it's dead.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a while and now it's dead. Worked well while it worked, but a few months later and nada. It just didn't last and thats the last Anker product I ever get - too many failures.
customer_reviews.author: dawhoo

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This worked for one day. Waste of money. Burned out and does not work. Don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JEK

customer_reviews.title: High quality fast charging block
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this I was a bit worried by some of the reviews that mentioned having technical difficulties or getting a dud product or such and such. Turns out my worries were unfounded! Build quality on the whole feels very sturdy and well-made, and the prongs fold out smoothly and easily. It charges my IPhone XR and AirPods simultaneously with no problems, blisteringly fast compared to the stock charger (I also used it with Anker PowerLine cables, My only little gripes are that it runs a bit hot during prolonged fast charging and is a bit bigger than I had expected, but those are absolutely not dealbreakers for me. Overall a perfect option for faster charging, would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: honeybumpkinsmoochypoo

customer_reviews.title: High-quality dual USB outlet power block.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Anker Power Port II to replace the Power Port I have been using for several year, but which will now go into a fixed position near my bed to power the cables for my iPhone and my new Apple Watch 3. I had no problems with the older unit, and anticipate none with the newer unit, whose corners now are a bit rounded. Any of these are better than the small fixed blade units that Apple supplies with its smaller devices.
customer_reviews.author: Alan M. Birnbaum

customer_reviews.title: Simply the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: These wall chargers are amazing. It doesn't say "fast charging" on my phone but I plugged my original charger in which tells me it's fast charging and then the Anker. The time to full charge was exactly the same. This charger is solid, lightweight and has the fold in plug. I had previously purchased 2 fast chargers from Samsung and each failed after 4 months. Only providing a regular charge. Buy these wall chargers!! You won't be sorry. In fact, I just ordered 2 more so I have one at work and a back up although I doubt I'll need it anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Radia Clark

customer_reviews.title: Anker: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Anker charging device. As with the others, this one is well built and feels like quality. It charges things as you'd expect. I bought this one for travel - the folding plug is convenient. The other two are the four port variety. One is 3+ years old and working well. The other, newer one I bought for my office. Anker also makes great portable battery chargers for on the go, I have two of them. In general, every Anker product I've purchased holds up and does the job. I have paid full price for all these products and have received no compensation for this review. :-)
customer_reviews.author: klmbaer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, durable charger
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get thrown around at work so that I have a charger I can use to charge my phone and headphones when needed. The prongs fold up into the charger so that they don't catch or get in the way while it's being stored. While I've had other chargers where that mechanism fell apart after some use, I'm fairly confident this one will last, it feels very sturdy. Only bad thing is the glossy finish attracts fingerprints and scratches easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dilan

customer_reviews.title: Mine was junk but they replaced it
customer_reviews.text: Worked only on one port and have to unplug it and wait till the light turns off. Then plug it in, sometimes it takes a few trys. My Anker cable ive have for over a year with no problems. I’m suprised this thing ended up sucking. Already threw away the packing or i would return it. Update: they sent me a new one which seems to operate properly. Id give five stars if I didn’t have to waste money and time buying an emergency offbrand cube charger at 3am when this one stopped working completely.
customer_reviews.author: Henry McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Functional, Sleek Wall Charger
customer_reviews.text: After my iPhone charger finally fell apart, I immediately turned to anker to look for a replacement. I now own several anker products, including their portable charger/power bank, and have been extremely happy with the quality of each product. I bought this wall charger with the corresponding anker usb cord. I really like the little blue light that turns on when it’s plugged into the wall. Easy to see in the dark, and to verify that the outlet you plugged into works! Having two USB ports is a great, functional design as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sophster

customer_reviews.title: Anker Makes The Best Products
customer_reviews.text: Once again, Anker delivers. This thing is great around the house and for travel. Two ports and a reasonable size while packing a lot a punch. This thing will charge whatever you need super fast. Buy a few and keep one in the car, one in your travel bag, one in your office. You won't be upset having extra of these.
customer_reviews.author: Keagan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I took this power core on a trip where I’d be off the grid for 5-6 days. I used it twice to charge camera batteries, once to charge my e-reader, and three times to charge my phone after playing solitaire. I also used it for an hour during the flight back to civilization. After all of that, it was still showing a 50% charge. I’m very impressed with this power core! It does take time to charge the device, even with an Anker adapter. However, once it’s fully charged, it lasts and lasts. I’m very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Gatos4

customer_reviews.title: Good product but no quick charge.
customer_reviews.text: I love anker products, but I purchased this one under the impression that it would quick charge given the reviews I've seen, but on my note 9 it slow charges. Now it's a great compact product, don't get me wrong, but I bought it to quick charge, not slow charge. I wish anker would have stepped in and corrected some of these reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: The Ultimate Charger in the House
customer_reviews.text: It’s so small yet so compact with quick charge technology you’ll be glad you’re living in the 21st century. My friends and siblings always want to hog this charger because it can really charge your device super fast, even if it doesn’t have the latest fast charge technology. I like this one better than the other dual port charger because it’s even smaller and more stylish with its glossy finish. I definitely recommend it for anyone who wants to charge multiple devices fast.
customer_reviews.author: StepOfHan

customer_reviews.title: Updated new version is much better. From 3 to 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Updated They replaced my old unit after contact issues. The new version is fantastic. No longer have a bright light but a respectable LED. My big issue with the old unit was that it always pulled out of the wall socket. This new version is SIGNIFICANTLY better. Their customer service pleasantly surprised me. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: MarkO

customer_reviews.title: Favorite charger!
customer_reviews.text: I love this charger and have two of them. Also had the previous version, which lasted over two years before the plug hinge started sparking because of a loose contact. It was heavily used so I don't mind. I use this one to charge my iPhone 6s Plus. I really enjoy Anker products and trust them for chargers, cables, and battery packs. And this is not a bot making this post.
customer_reviews.author: Phil P

customer_reviews.title: Not for high end phones
customer_reviews.text: Item works but isn't really meant for modern smart phones need more power. This charger takes forever to charge Charging from 0/5% power to 100% took almost 8 hours+ hours even if only 1 device is plugged in. Infact Samsung diagnostic says not to use this device. So yeah maybe I should have read the description better about wattage . This is definently not compatible with s10
customer_reviews.author: Faizan

customer_reviews.title: Yet another winner from Anker!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased the earlier iterations of this item and have loved each one! The speed of charging is impressive and the convenience is top notch! After sending the prior model with my daughters on a visit to their mothers house, it never returned. Due to the price, I simply decided to buy a “kit” for my girls, with this new plug, two Anker lightning cables and a case, so they could have everything they needed in one place. It has worked very well, and they were pleased to have “their own ‘Blue light charger’”
customer_reviews.author: John and Judi

customer_reviews.title: Anker Never Fails
customer_reviews.text: This charger worked out great when I used it to charge it my iPhone and Bluetooth speaker. I recently bought some new PD chargers to charge my devices even faster. But this charger is nearly as good and I still have it around to use it whenever I want. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Anker makes yet another winner... Excellent devices for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5-port Anker USB charger that is great, but a little bigger than I'd like for when it comes to short trips since I prefer to travel light. I recently bought an iPad Pro so picked this up so I could charge my Note 8 and iPad while on the go. It slips very easily into one of the small pockets of my backpack, and provides enough juice to charge both devices at the same time. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: ND Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality, smaller than previous version
customer_reviews.text: I have the previous version of this charger as well, and this one (the PowerPort II) is even smaller with the same solid build quality. It's my go-to charger when traveling, reliable, small and enough power for phone and tablet. The LED ring is a nice touch, it's not too bright to keep you awake at night, but a good indicator that it gets power. Anker has always been reliable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: Anker makes great reliable wall chargers and multiport hubs as well as cables
customer_reviews.text: The materials are high quality. The plug connections are very high quality and work smoothly. This wall charger is on my desk connected with a lightning cable and a power-bank cable providing immediate charging power for my iPad as well as mobile power for on the road. I highly recommend Anker products.
customer_reviews.author: Art4Ebusiness

customer_reviews.title: Compact size, gargantuan power
customer_reviews.text: I am a frequent traveler and rely heavily upon the cables and wall chargers that I bring with me. Anker continues to produce some of the most amazing, high-quality cables and wall chargers ever. I have like this thing around with me as I’ve covered thousands of miles over the past six months, and it has never disappointed once. Compact design, solid build, and amazing fast-charging capabilities!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Bag

customer_reviews.title: Charging Light Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always liked Anker products and I’m disappointed with this charger lacking of a working indicator light. While the charging seems to be working, the indicator light stays blue and does not change regardless if its charging or not.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Compact, fast, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I didn't used to think that there was a difference between chargers, but the one proved me wrong. Anker products are worth the few extra bucks. Well-made, fitting both the out let and the cords with a nice solid think--none of the wobble I found in cheaper units. Definitely worth the extra money!!
customer_reviews.author: lewes

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't charge quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this while traveling and needed a usb charger for 2 devices. It works, it seems stable, but it does not charge quickly. Be prepared to leave stuff plugged in overnight to get a full charge. I don't consider that a flaw, just a feature. Just be prepared for that.
customer_reviews.author: madmaud

customer_reviews.title: GREAT charger
customer_reviews.text: This is the best travel charger, the dual USB ports charge fast & the size is perfectly compact. I have had this for months & use at least twice a month... it still works great! Another Anker product I love... definitely worth purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Quick, stay pluged in, and convienient!
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews I decided that Anker was paying attention to the customers issues, so I decided to buy three of them. The worked so well I order a fourth and junked all my old USB chargers. They charge fast, stay plugged into the wall and power strips, and the pilot light is unobtrusive. Finally the two USB outlets make it very handy.
customer_reviews.author: James T. Brady

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I used this while traveling with others. This allowed all of us to charge with little fighting over the outlet. We have a mixture of android and iOS devices and this worked regardless. It also saves a little space as we only needed this one charger for two people most of the time. If you travel with others, I recommend a gadget like this!
customer_reviews.author: A. Ski

customer_reviews.title: Amazing device charges my tablet in an incredibly short time// ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing device charges my tablet in an incredibly short time// My tablet would take in excess of 8 hours to charge from a completely uncharged state to100%. The Anker accomplished this in less than an hour//FANTASTIC !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Bicicchi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: If you need to replace your power brick grab this one. This has the ability to charge 2 devices (tablet & phone) at same time and charge them faster than your standard brick. QI, can’t go wrong for Apple products. These people know what they are doing when it comes to building quality!! Grab a POWERLINE II then go with this and you’ll see your charge time cut down significantly. I purchased for new iPhone X
customer_reviews.author: Vivek

customer_reviews.title: ... some weight to the product which is telling of better quality. At least in the old days
customer_reviews.text: This has some weight to the product which is telling of better quality. At least in the old days. I've had mine for 2 months and no issues. I also love the additional IQ features which calculates the type of charge and goes easier on you're battery without sacrificing speed or ghost-like charging quality (sometimes a battery issue or terrible charger).
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Better than the old Dual PowerIQ
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these around the house coupled with Anker cords and they work well. I like the multiple ports. I like that they light up. Still a little too big, my airwick diffusers kind of get in the way if they're on the same outlet. Hope it doesn't compromise longevity but the build quality seems good. Definitely smaller than the old dual powerIQ
customer_reviews.author: russell

customer_reviews.title: High quality and chic powerful beast
customer_reviews.text: My brother loves Anker products. This is the first Anker for me. I was impressed with how fast it charges my devices. I have a XS Max and iPad. It charges both in very short time. I wasn’t expecting that on such an affordable prices product. Impressed so far
customer_reviews.author: Eddie D

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Value,  Superior Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Apple should take notes! Anker makes awesome products, has great presentation, and outlast Apple’s more expensive cables hands down! I’ve ordered several cables from Anker this past year and continue to be impressed with each delivery. I am usually one to stay with the manufacturer’s products vs third party stuff but, these guys offer a product better than the original and, you can not beat the savings. Great Job - and thanks.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: What is not to like?
customer_reviews.text: I've dropped them, spilt coffee it... they are solid, portable, dual port, fast, reliable - and they look good. If you need a wall charger, you need to buy it. I hate krap that doesn't work and isn't reliable - this works, and it works well!
customer_reviews.author: Steakburger

customer_reviews.title: Not a quick charge, customer care helped with the issue
customer_reviews.text: Charger is good, but not a fast charging or quick charge. Update 8/30 - Updated rating from 3 to 5, Anker customer service was great, they reached out to me and solved my issue for fast charge, they clarified its not a quick charge. I am a satisfied customer now.
customer_reviews.author: Sharad

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: Works great and fast , holds up very well. Been using these for several years. I have about 8 of them in all and I don't think one has worn out yet. Their cords also work well except on some iPhone cases with too small openings to the cord connector. Not an issue on my Android phone.
customer_reviews.author: Printer Hater

customer_reviews.title: Works but is a bit big
customer_reviews.text: Works about twice as fas as the junk iPhone chargers that come with most IPhones. It’s much bigger than I’d prefer. But you can’t always have the best of both worlds. Would much prefer to drag this around than have a tiny one that takes hours to charge a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Emmett

customer_reviews.title: some room to improve, but I still give 5 star
customer_reviews.text: many times wall power socket only has two spot of two prong outlet which leaves very little room between two outlets, when plug in this one, I can't plug another adapter for laptop for example. If the power tip of this charge can be swivel toward corner instead of from corner, it will leave more space between power outlets. To be fair, this one already is the smallest one, just hope vendor can figure out a way to make it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Charges as expected..
customer_reviews.text: These charge as expected. I’ve never really had trouble with anker products. Whether it be wires or charge devices, both backup batteries or wall plugs. If I do, their customer service goes above and beyond to make it right. If they didn’t, I wouldn’t keep buying their products.
customer_reviews.author: chuckntx

customer_reviews.title: Plastic broke
customer_reviews.text: Had this in the drawer for a long time. When it was time to use it the mechanism that flaps open the plugs failed and broke off. Spent so much money in this only to throw it out. Wish I had a chance to use it. The mechanism is totally flimsy and will fail with use.
customer_reviews.author: Kinan Alrahi

customer_reviews.title: good fast charger
customer_reviews.text: This charger arrived within the time promised. It's replacing the older version of the same charger that lasted me years. This type of quick charger works super fast (At least 3x faster than standard USB chargers).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Need
customer_reviews.text: While hiking the Appalachian Trail, I need to charge my power bank, phone, headlamp, GoPro batteries, etc when I get into a town. The Anker dual charger lets me do this faster. It's small and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Wingnut

customer_reviews.title: Fine charger, but I liked the old one better...
customer_reviews.text: Anker products are my go-to products for charging devices. This dual charger Is an updated version of one I purchased previously. While this one works just fine, I am disappointed that the little charging indicator has been changed. Previously, the charging light turned green when it was charging a device then turned blue when it was finished. Now, the light is always blue. I prefer the other, older design and wish I could have purchased that one instead of the newer version.
customer_reviews.author: Muddipaws

customer_reviews.title: Faster but not super fast...
customer_reviews.text: I did think it would work faster than it does but it is definitely faster then my other chargers. So--it is an improvement and the price was right---got the lead on Wirecutter!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J.

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in 2018. I bring it to work with me along with Anker cables in case my coworkers or myself need to charge our phones. The material used to make this feels like it is high-quality material. A few drops on the tile floor and the charger is still going strong. I didn't even need to try to convince my coworkers to use Anker, after the first time using this they asked me where I bought it. Why use cheap chargers that can ruin your phone which costs close to $1,000? #UseAnkerInstead
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. Have had this for a week. Plug my phone in at night to charge all night. In the morning it's only at 50%. I switched back to my old charger. Had high hopes for this device, but not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: Takes 6 hours to fully charge one phone not a fast charger, wish I could return. UPDATE This was the wrong charger for my phone. Anker quickly supplied me with the correct charger: the powerport+1. Best charger I've ever had. Thanks Anker!
customer_reviews.author: Cam R Zetterberg

customer_reviews.title: I love Anker products!
customer_reviews.text: I love anker they’re one of the greatest companies out there that offer quality, cheap price and great customer service. Love the packaging really premium feeling. It charges faster than the OEM apple one but of course it will take 2hrs maybe 3 to get full charge on an iPhone XS Max. I recommend

customer_reviews.title: If you’re still

customer_reviews.title: Best charger I have found

customer_reviews.title: Best USB charger available.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Excellent charger. I chose the Anker brand based on a recommendation from a friend. I have one in my car that charges my phone super fast. I have this one in my bathroom & it’s great to have 2 ports. I use it to charge a therapy light & Bluetooth speakers.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA COHEN

customer_reviews.title: The blue light drives me nuts at night
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement charger in my bedroom for my phone. Unfortunately, this one has a bright blue light that drives me crazy at night. Time to find a different one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy charging with this Dual USB charger.
customer_reviews.text: Great fast charger unit that small and fast charging. Works great on my large battery charger that holds a massive amount of stored power and takes 16 hours to top off if completely drained. Only 5 hours with this plug. Strong buy recommendation on this product and Anker products in general.
customer_reviews.author: Jkkiller11

customer_reviews.title: The Anker charger has cut charging time at least in ...
customer_reviews.text: The Anker charger has cut charging time at least in half even when charging an iPhone and an iPad. Cant't comment on long term use since I have only had it for 2 weeks. the reason I tried the Anker charger is that I had an original iPhone charger that started to get warm while charging and seemed very slow.
customer_reviews.author: Violets71

customer_reviews.title: Best overall iPhone charger out there!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Feels durable and charges two iPads at once faster than any other charging 1 iPad alone. Charges fast, pair it with a power line II + and you’ll get the fastest charge for your iPhone. Compact and easy to use for travel.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Great product and small too =)
customer_reviews.text: the product arrived without problem, my main reason was to charge my powercore 13000, to date it's working great. i charged some other devices (Android, ipad, DS4 controller) and charged both slots nicely. i will update my review if the wallcharger couldn't last enough.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardcf

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these. The first one does not work properly unless I hold it steady when plugged in and charging. Not practical. The second one works perfectly and is very handy when traveling and/or charging more than one devise at a time. Would have a 5 except for the defect in the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Love the anker products! This is especially good for traveling and charging devices overnight. I feel safe using the anker products.
customer_reviews.author: Leegayle

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t have a true LED status indicator
customer_reviews.text: Note: unlike prior Powerport chargers this “upgraded” version does not have a true LED status indicator. The circular LED lights blue when it is plugged in and remains blue whether charging or not. The charger is slightly smaller than the Powerport 4 which provides 40 watt and 4 USB ports, but does have a LED status indicator that switches to green when charging a device. Update: Anker Customer Service was extremely helpful and directed me to the previous model with a functioning LED status indicator.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: I’ll never go back to the cheap kind!
customer_reviews.text: When I use this charger and one of the powerline cords, my phone charges so much faster. I convinced my family to make the switch to these and so for, everyone is very pleased. I will never buy the “lifetime gaurentee” cheapo cords again.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Trust worthy brand
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought multiple Anker chargers and use them daily. It’s a brand that I trust. I’m very pleased with their quality and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Chas. Brunner

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I was introduced to it on a job, and saw its power and potential for many uses around our home. I love not only, the double ports, but as well the knowledge that my devices are being properly powered with the correct amounts each time they are plugged in. Great product!

customer_reviews.title: This USB charger is bad ass!
customer_reviews.text: This USB charger is bad ass!!!!! I like that it will give 2.4amp per USB, which really charges my external devices like cellphone, gopro, mirrorless camera batteries, etc very fast and efficient. I am also very happy with shipping, as I received my item in 2 days shipping to Hawaii.. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Reyton S.

customer_reviews.title: This charger is super convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I love that the plug itself folds down to easily tuck away in my bag. It also makes charging devices for myself and my childrend easier when it comes to saving outlet space. I would definitely recommend this to others...as well as buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: Power!
customer_reviews.text: Provides two 5v 2.4 amp charging USBs. Useful for people traveling and needing to charge two different devices.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Portable
customer_reviews.text: This charger is a great grab for the price! It makes quick work of charging anything from my SmartWatch to my Nintendo switch. The prongs full inward so it can easily be carried about in a bag or a pocket if you need a portable AC adapter on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: anker is the best
customer_reviews.text: Anker just plain makes the best charging/battery items, including this charger which is able to charge my iphone X about halfway in 30 mins. Very useful when you're trying to run out the door!

customer_reviews.title: Well made and universal!
customer_reviews.text: These are well built and save me tons of space when traveling. Typically, I have like half a dozen devices to charge (iPhone, headphones, Bluetooth speaker, etc) and having these chargers makes it so convenient!

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem to be charging my Anker rapid power supply ...

customer_reviews.title: Best brand for Apple devices
customer_reviews.text: Perfect dual charger. This is my new go to brand for Apple chargers and cords. Dependable, quality made and durable.

customer_reviews.title: Anker's products are great. The customer service is as good as their products.
customer_reviews.text: I am a long-time customer of Anker. I have always loved their high-quality products. I bought one of these chargers to go with some Anker cables. I had something go wrong with it within a couple of days. Fortunately, Anker's customer service has been very friendly and helpful to fix my issues completely. They have even gone so far as to send me a replacement free of charge, and the replacement worked perfectly! Thanks again, Anker!

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: All Anker gear is well made and functions as advertised. This is no exception. Love it. Recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Great brand.  Great charger.
customer_reviews.text: Anker produces really nice devices and this one does not disappoint. It is well made and charges two devices very fast. I haven't had any issues with it or with it charging any device I've connected it to.

customer_reviews.title: Charges much faster

customer_reviews.title: Fast charging unit
customer_reviews.text: I thought that my charging port needed to be replaced. The Guys at Nerdtap said "It's your charger." I had FOUR chargers that all seemed to fail at about the same time. They suggested Anker and I am VERY PLEASED with it! Rapid charge, well made, prongs fold into charger so it's a smooth transition into and out of my purse of luggage!

After purchasing our 1st Anker product (cables, chargers)and being very pleased with Superb qualuty, price, service.. i always check to see if anker has what i need. the recently purchased rapid, foldable charget is so great, that we now have 3.

product_meta.title: Anker Dual USB Wall Charger, PowerPort II 24W, Ultra-Compact Travel Charger with PowerIQ Technology and Foldable Plug, for iPhone XS/Max/XR/X/8/7/6/Plus, iPad Pro/Air 2/mini 4, Galaxy S9/S8/+ and More
product_meta.description:
Color:WhitePowerPort II with 2 PowerIQ Ports
The Ultra-Portable USB Wall Charger

From ANKER, America’s Leading USB Charging Brand
- Faster and safer charging with our advanced technology
- 50 million+ happy users and counting

Charge Fast, Live More
Anker’s advanced PowerIQ technology detects and adapts to your device’s unique charging protocol, to deliver a tailored-high speed charge—getting you away from the wall faster.

Perfectly Portable
One of the smallest 2-port chargers you’ve ever seen. The foldable plug which snaps effortly out for charging, then back in to fit in any size bag or pocket.

Two for One
Turn one outlet into a compact charging station. Charge two devices simultaneously and save even more time for the most important things.

World Famous Warranty
At Anker, we believe in our products. That's why we back them all with an 18-month warranty and provide friendly, easy-to-reach support.

Notes:
This charger does not support Quick Charge 3.0. Devices equipped with Quick Charge, like the Samsung Galaxy series, will charge at normal speeds. 

LED indicator will illuminate when plugged in, regardless of whether or not a connected device is fully charged. 

PowerPort II is compatible with iPhone X, iPhone 8, iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 6/6S, iPhone 6/6S Plus, iPhone 5/5S/SE, iPhone 5C, iPhone 4/4S, Samsung Galaxy S7, Samsung Galaxy S7 edge, Samsung Galaxy S6, Samsung Galaxy S6 edge, Samsung Galaxy S5, Samsung Galaxy S4, Samsung Galaxy Note 4, Samsung Galaxy Note 5, LG G3, LG G4, LG G5, and more.

Input: AC 100-240V-0.7A 50-60Hz
Output: 5.0V=4.8A (2.4A Max Per Port)

PowerPort II is compatible with iPhone X, iPhone 8, iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 6/6S, iPhone 6/6S Plus, iPhone 5/5S/SE, iPhone 5C, iPhone 4/4S, Samsung Galaxy S7, Samsung Galaxy S7 edge, Samsung Galaxy S6, Samsung Galaxy S6 edge, Samsung Galaxy S5, Samsung Galaxy S4, Samsung Galaxy Note 4, Samsung Galaxy Note 5, LG G3, LG G4, LG G5, and more.
feature_bullets: The Anker Advantage: Join the 50 million+ powered by our leading technology.
Advanced charging technology: powerful and Voltage Boost combine to provide the fastest possible charge up to 2. 4 amps per port or 4. 8 amps overall (does not support Qualcomm Quick Charge).
Unrivalled portability: super-compact, with a foldable plug for limitless portability. Go wherever the Adventure takes you.
Double duty: twin USB ports provide enough power to charge 2 devices simultaneously.
What you get: Anker PowerPort 2 with 2 power ports, welcome Guide, our 1-day response customer service, and worry-free 18-month.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,556 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
